00018 /*
00019  * Model_Refiner.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *
00023  *  Created on: 23-Dec-2010

00026 
00027 #ifndef MODEL_REFINER_H_
00028 #define MODEL_REFINER_H_
00029 
00030 #include "google/protobuf/message.h"
00031 
00032 //!An interface that defines the necessary refinements
00033 //!for refining the LDA graphical model and its extensions.
00034 /**
00035  * A refinement is defined as an operation done to improve
00036  * the model like sampling. The definition is also extended
00037  * to operations that enable a refinement like reading documents
00038  * and evaluating log-likelihoods.
00039  *
00040  * The provider of a model's implementation has to implement
00041  * this interface suitably
00042  */
00043 class Model_Refiner {
00044 public:
00045     virtual google::protobuf::Message* allocate_document_buffer(size_t) = 0;
00046     virtual void deallocate_document_buffer(google::protobuf::Message*) = 0;
00047     virtual google::protobuf::Message* get_nth_document(
00048             google::protobuf::Message* docs, size_t n) = 0;
00049     virtual void* read(google::protobuf::Message&) = 0;
00050     virtual void* sample(void*) = 0;
00051     virtual void* test(void*) = 0;
00052     virtual void* update(void*) = 0;
00053     virtual void* optimize(void*) = 0;
00054     virtual void* eval(void*, double&) = 0;
00055     virtual void write(void*) = 0;
00056     virtual void iteration_done() = 0;
00057 };
00058 
00059 #endif /* MODEL_REFINER_H_ */
